description: Position mechanical box assembly on table (already positioned at start).
Pick up first hex nut for shaft.
Place and tighten first hex nut on first shaft on Gear Plate.
Pick up second hex nut for shaft.
Place and tighten second hex nut on second shaft on Gear Plate.
Place large yellow gear on first shaft, resting on first nut.
Place small yellow gear on second shaft, resting on second nut, and meshing with large gear.
Pick up third hex nut (to secure large gear).
Place and tighten third hex nut on first shaft, securing large yellow gear.
Position worm gear assembly on Gear Plate, meshing its worm gear with the large yellow gear.
Pick up fourth hex nut (to secure small gear).
Place and tighten fourth hex nut on second shaft, securing small yellow gear.
Pick up first screw for worm gear assembly.
Insert and hand-tighten first screw into worm gear assembly base.
Pick up second screw for worm gear assembly.
Insert and hand-tighten second screw into worm gear assembly base.
